001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.config;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.config.WebDriverConfig;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.factory.WebDriverFactory;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.listeners.WebDriverEventListener;
006import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
007import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.validator.UiTableValidator;
008import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.validator.UiTableValidatorImpl;
009import org.openqa.selenium.support.events.EventFiringDecorator;
010import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
011import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
012import org.springframework.context.annotation.Lazy;
013import org.springframework.context.annotation.Scope;
014
015import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.config.UiConfigHolder.getUiConfig;
016
017/**
018 * Spring configuration class for managing UI-related beans.
019 *
020 * <p>This class defines beans for WebDriver and UI table validation, enabling dependency injection
021 * for Selenium-based UI interactions and validation functionalities.
022 *
023 * <p>The configuration follows a lazy initialization strategy to optimize resource usage.
024 * WebDriver instances are created with a "prototype" scope, ensuring each test receives a fresh instance.
025 *
026 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
027 */
028@Configuration
029public class UiInteractionAutoConfiguration {
030
031   /**
032    * Provides a lazily initialized and prototype-scoped {@link SmartWebDriver} bean.
033    *
034    * <p>This method creates a WebDriver instance based on the UI framework configuration.
035    * It supports remote and local execution and applies an event-firing decorator to enhance logging and debugging.
036    *
037    * @return A new instance of {@link SmartWebDriver}.
038    */
039   @Bean
040   @Lazy
041   @Scope("prototype")
042   public SmartWebDriver webDriver() {
043      return new SmartWebDriver(
044            WebDriverFactory.createDriver(
045                  getUiConfig().browserType(),
046                  WebDriverConfig.builder()
047                        .version(getUiConfig().browserVersion())
048                        .headless(getUiConfig().headless())
049                        .remote(getUiConfig().remoteDriverUrl() != null && !getUiConfig().remoteDriverUrl().isEmpty())
050                        .remoteUrl(getUiConfig().remoteDriverUrl())
051                        .eventFiringDecorator(new EventFiringDecorator<>(new WebDriverEventListener()))
052                        .build()
053            )
054      );
055   }
056
057   /**
058    * Provides a lazily initialized {@link UiTableValidator} bean.
059    *
060    * <p>This validator facilitates automated assertions on table-based UI components.
061    * It ensures consistency in table data validation across tests.
062    *
063    * @return A new instance of {@link UiTableValidatorImpl}.
064    */
065   @Bean
066   @Lazy
067   public UiTableValidator uiTableValidator() {
068      return new UiTableValidatorImpl();
069   }
070
071}
